title: Bronze ranked 5's icon
body: So ive been using my bronze ranked 5s icon. It shows in the loading screen as a bronze ranked 3's icon. No big deal just wondering if it happens to anyone else.

replies.body: I'd seen this problem when the season ended, and saw posts that Riot was aware of it but I thought it got fixed. Just go ahead and put this in the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) NA board.
